HeadComp.title: MessageBird vs MSG91 | Compare Communication APIs & Messaging Platforms
HeadComp.description: Compare cloud messaging solutions effectively with MSG91 vs MessageBird for smarter communication today. Choose MSG91 for your business now.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs MessageBird
CompareBannerComp.subheading: Bird (formerly MessageBird) specializes in omnichannel communication with strong focus on messaging APIs, live chat, and customer engagement across channels like WhatsApp, SMS, and voice. In contrast, MSG91 offers a robust omnichannel platform integrating SMS, email, WhatsApp, RCS, and more. With features like AI-driven customer journeys, dynamic segmentation, and deep analytics, MSG91 provides scalable and data-driven multichannel messaging solutions to boost customer engagement.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 provides a scalable omnichannel platform featuring SMS, email, WhatsApp, AI-driven journeys, and advanced analytics for data-driven communication.

content.name: MessageBird
content.des: MessageBird offers omnichannel messaging with APIs, live chat, and customer engagement across SMS, WhatsApp, and voice.

features.pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.multi_agent_support: MessageBird charges $30 per seat after 2 free seats.
features.omnichannel_communication: Email, SMS, WhatsApp, Voice and more
features.ai_chatbot_integration: Supports AI chatbot creation via Flow Builder with AI Actions
features.unlimited_bot_creation: MessageBird charges a monthly fee of $10 per active chatbot.
features.whatsapp_payments: MessageBird do not support direct payment integration.
features.whatsapp_carousels: Supports creating and sending WhatsApp carousel templates.
features.whatsapp_catalogs: Create and share the product catalog.
features.customer_journey_creation: Yes,  you can create the customer journey via multiple channels.
features.client_segmentation: Advanced client segmentation with automation and contact triggers.
features.integration_and_plugins: Integrates with multiple platforms like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Shopify
features.otp_verification: WhatsApp (via templates), SMS, Email, and Voice
features.otp_widget: MessageBird does not offer a pre-built, plug-and-play OTP  widget.
features.unified_platform: Unified marketing dashboard with Segmentation, AI automation, and omnichannel campaign tools.
features.customer_support_quality: MessageBird offers limited email support on the free plan; 24/7 priority support via phone, WhatsApp, and email is available with paid support plans.
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Offers Meta Ads tracking and analytics via a unified dashboard.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
